short_summary: Bench-top, single-use chromatography system and 150-200mm ID columns
description: The National Research Council (NRC) Human Health Therapeutics has a requirement for the supply of a bench-top chromatography system, a single-use Chromatography system, and four new chromatography columns.
duration_in_months: There is no specific duration for this contract. However, the expected contract start date is not specified. Therefore, agreement on the duration of this requirement is needed during contract award negotiations.
full_summary:
**Title:**
Tender for the Supply of Bench-top Chromatography System and Chromatography Columns

**Notice Number:** 23-58197
**Publication Date:** December 19, 2023
**Closing Date:** January 3, 2024, 14:00:00

**Tender Status:** Expired

**Procurement Category:** Goods and Services
**Procurement Method:** Advance Contract Award Notice

**Trade Agreements:** The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)

**Supply Requirements:**
The National Research Council (NRC) Human Health Therapeutics has a requirement for the supply of:

1. One bench-top, single-use chromatography system equivalent to the AKTA Pilot 600s
2. One single-use chromatography system equivalent to the AKTA ready gradient
3. Four new chromatography columns equivalent to the AxiChrom, consisting of two 140mm and two 200mm internal diameter (ID)

**delivery Location:** All supplies must be delivered to Montreal, Canada.

**Contact Information:**
Andrew Jefferson
Email: andrew.jefferson@nrc-cnrc.gc.ca
Telephone: (236) 464-5516

You may obtain the tender documents by visiting this website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28008/23-58197_acan_chromatography_columns_0.pdf (English) or https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28008/23-58197_acan_chromatography_columns_f.pdf (French).
